name: Nielson
description: '''Niels Littooij''' (born 28 December 1989), better known by his stage name '''Nielson''', is a Dutch singer-songwriter. He was a member of the Dutch music trio Zirkus Zirkus in the early 2010s, but rose to national fame in 2012 due to his participation in the television programme ''[[De beste singer-songwriter van Nederland]]''.
